forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 53. East northeast wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely after 8am. Mostly cloudy. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. East wind 7 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 52. South southeast wind 2 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
